shing// dbang mo lce la reg pa ni// tshogs mchod dus la bab pa'i brda// lag gnyis bskor nas dbang mo 'thong// de nas dbang mo lce la reg/ 'dza' gad 'dim pa'i brda thabs so// ma hA ging chen karma dang/ rdo rje drod kyi rtags 'dzin las// sogs pa'i brda yi dam tshig rnams// rnal 'byor can gyis spyad na 'grub// lus brda dam tshig phyag rgya'o// zhes smra ba'i seng ges gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rnal 'byor brda'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang smra ba'i seng ge sems dpa'i rdo rje de rnal 'byor rol pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang// 'dus pa chen pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ smra ba'i seng ge chen po chos thams cad ni rdo rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo zhes gsol pa dang/ smra ba'i seng ges bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje tshogs yin par shes par gyis shigaces bka' stsal pa dang/ 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi don bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol// sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs// rdo rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs dam ste// rnal 'byor kun gyis spyad pa'i lam// sa mchog bgrod pa'i lam 'di dag/ 'dus pa'i tshogs la bshad par

bya// brtsam pa las kyi dang po pa// rdo rje tshogs la 'jug pa na// khyad par rim pa ci bzhin du// las mchog 'di yi rang bzhin gyis// ji bzhin rim par sbyangs nas kyang// sa rab mchog tu bgrod pa la// thabs mchog lnga yis bgrod bya ste// rdo rje tshogs dang bsnyed pa dang// nye ba dang ni bsgrub pa dang// bsgrub pa chen por sbyar bar bya// ji ltar grangs dang dus chen dang// mtshan ma byung bar bcas rnams las// gab pa'i sba thabs de sbyar nas// sus mi rig pa'i thabs chen bya// de dag gsang ba'i bdag po yin// gnas 'dir 'jug pa'i byis pa dag/ 'jig rten rdul las drangs nas kyang// 'gyur dbang ma nges sar bzhag ste// ci phyir dang po yin pas na// byis pa blo shed ma bye bas// bzang ngan bde sdug mi shes shing// bstan dang gsang ba'i dmigs mi byed// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bka' sgo'i 'dir// gsang sgo mi dbye skrag par 'gyur// rang bzhin ngang tshul ma rtogs pa'i// so so'i skye bo byis pa las// snod med snod byas bdud nyid kyis// rnal 'byor 'tshe ba'i srog gcod cing// ma nges ldog 'jug bcas pa yis// gsang 'di bcas dkar 'gyur phyir ro// de na 'di yi spyod pa yang/ ji ltar 'tsham par bde thabs sbyar/ de nas smra ba'i seng ge de thabs kyi rdo rje tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo rnams mi snang bar gyur to// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ smra ba'i seng ge chen po chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni thabs kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo// sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'di dag ni brgyud de sbas pa'i tshogs yin par shes par bya'o// rdo rje rnal 'byor tshogs ldan lnga// thabs chen phyag rgya sbas tshogs lnga// rdo rje 'dzin sogs bcu drug dang// bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje can/ bri bya yang na bsam pa'am// brjod dam bsngos sam mtshan ma la// 'jig rten dbang po'i chos lugs kyis// mos pa la bskyed dran byas te// rang bzhin yul nas phab nas ni// phyag bya la sogs mchod pa yis// rdo rje sman dang rtsir sbyar ba'i// yo byad chen po la sogs pas// rdo rje thabs kyi tshogs la dbul// rdo rje rnal 'byor glu blangs te// mnyes byas las grub grangs rdzogs nas// mchod dang dam skongs 'dod pa bya// snod du rung ba'i slob ma dag/ dpa' mkhyen la sogs bya ba yis// 'jug tshul dbang dang dngos grub stsol// rdo rje tha tshig rnam lnga yis// bslab pa'i gnyen rnams ci rigs par// rtsal gyi rim par byin nas ni// rdo rje gal chen mna' 'dor ro// de nas sgrub pa che chung rnams// 'di ltar 'dod pas nan tan gyis// rdo rje rnal 'byor

bkar bya'o// mi nus la sogs mi gnang ba'i// dam tshig dag gis nan chags bya// rmongs pa'i gsang phyir sems bskyed de// ngo mtshar tshig gi 'du shes bsgyur// shes nas mig la shes bya'i yul// thams cad rim gyis bstan par bya// drod can 'khyil ba'i blo ldan la// rnal 'byor na spar mdzod sgo dbye// rtsing po 'gros kyis dmu rgod la// gcan 'phrang 'khor ba'i g.yeng rnams bstan// rdo rje lung gi tshad can la// ji ltar nus pa de dbang bskur// btsal med mi nus yul can la// phan pa 'ba' zhig bsngags pa yin// gnas 'dir yod dang med pa dang// 'od mi bsub cing ljid mi dbab// rdo rje blo yi yul can la// rtsal chen sbyong zhes gdams par bya// rdo rje 'dus pa'i dbang gral du// rdo rje don gyi ltang chen bsher// rtsal dang rim pa khyad par dbye// so so rigs kyi phyag rgya dag/ spyi'am yang na re re'o// de nas smra ba'i seng ge de shes rab gzungs kyi tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang/ 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni shes rab tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du gda' bar bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo// de skad ces gsol ba dang/ sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni shes rab tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas par shes par gyis shigade ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad shes rab kyi rang bzhin las byung zhing shes rab kyi rang bzhin du gsal lo// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ sem dpa' chen po shes rab gzungs kyi rang bzhin bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol ba dang/ sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i tshogs// shes rab gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni// rgya cher bshad kyis shes par gyis// ji ltar thabs kyis tshogs sbyar ltar// gang dag rnal 'byor mar ldan rnams// rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa// lha mo'i tshogs su sbyar nas kyang// gnas 'dir 'jug dga' la sogs pa// thabs kyi phyag rgya mtshan mar sbas// rdo rje mnyam pa'i gzungs rnams la/ mnyam pa'i mchod pas mnyes par bya// bro gar glu tshigs la sogs pas// rig 'dzin rnal 'byor ma rnams bsgrub// ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de chos thams cad thabs dang she rab phan tshun dra bar 'brel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang// 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni thabs dang shes rab tu 'brel pa'i

rang bzhin can du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo// zhes gsol to// de skad ces gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa chos thams cad ni thabs dang shes rab tu 'brel ba ste/ gnyis su med par shes par gyis shigade nas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dra bar 'brel pa'i don bshad du gsol/ sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa// 'brel pa'i don ni 'di lta ste// chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni// phan tshun 'brel ba'i tshul du snang// chos kun nam mkha'a'i mtshan nyid las// sprul pa bye ba cir yang snang// gnyis med dra ba'i tshul du 'brel// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i mchog yin te// rtsal dang ldan pa gsang sgo ba// 'di la gsang sgo dbye bar bya// gsang 'dir tshud pa'i bu rnams la// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' 'di bsgrags// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di// rdo rje rgyal po rgyal mor bcas// lnga nyid zung du 'khril ba ni// g.yas nas g.yon du 'khril 'khyud sbyor// g.yas nyid byang chub rdo rje dang// rang rang mtshan ma 'bar ba'o// g.yon gyi sgra snyan dril bu dang// rtags kyis mdzes par gsal ba la// 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i mdangs ldan pas// chags shing g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni// seng chen khyu mchog la sogs pa// rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgyings bcas te// kha dog lnga yi 'ong 'bar bas// bcu drug chas na sgeg pa rnams// rim gyis bskyed dang cig car bskyed// dbang po'i rim pa sbyar bar bya// gsang nyid tshogs kyi 'khor rnams kyang// gnas nas gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis// phyag rgya rgyal po rgya mor bcas// brgyad gnyis zung sgril 'khril 'khyud sbyor// sa dang nam mkha' spyan rdo rje// byams dang rdo rje kun bzang dpal// nang dang phyi yi yo byad ni// gzhi gnyis dag gis mnyes sbyor ba// bsam bya la sogs de bzhin no// rdo rje sgo dang bcas pa ni// rdo rje 'khril 'khyud gsang ba'i tshogs// rnal 'byor longs spyod che sbyar bas// mnyes nas skongs phyir rim bzhin dbul/ gsang ba'i 'jug tshul la sogs kyis// gsang ba'i don rnams sgrub par byed// ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rje de rdo rje kun du 'brel ba'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje dra ba'i dbyings su bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs dra ba'i dbyings su shes par gyis shig/ chos thams cad ni thugs kyi rig pa las byung la thugs

kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje kho na yin pa'i phyir ro// 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dra ba chen po'i tshogs bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje chen po rig pa'i don// dra ba 'brel ba'i dbyings nyid ni// nges par bshad kyis rtse gcig nyon// thugs kyi gsang chen rig pa 'di// nges pa'i rdo rje yin pas na// rdo rje dbang yul 'brel ba'i don// thams cad 'byung bas dbyings shes bya'o// rdo rje 'dzin ma 'dzin sogs bcas// 'khril mnyam pa yang de bzhin te// gzugs brnyan ting 'dzin rang bzhin gnas// rim pa'i tshul bzhin sbyar byas nas// ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar ro// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de thams cad dus bzhi mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis chos thams cad ni dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du gcig par mthong ngo zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni dus bzhi mnyam par rtog pa yin te/ chos thams cad ni dus bzhi'i ngang du rdzogs par shes par gyis shigade ci'i phyir zhe na/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la dus snga phyir snang ba med do// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa chen po'i dus nyid bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po yi ni tshogs// mnyam pa nyid kyi dus rig na// dus zhes bya ba'i ming yang med// dus bzhi mnyam par rab shes na// chos nyid mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no// rdo rje dus kyi lha mo'i tshogs// 'das dang da ltar byung ba dang// mi 'byung ba yi cha rnams la// dbang sgyur mnyam pa'i rgyal mo rnams// 'jig dang skye dang smin pa dang/ 'gag par gyur ba de dag du// rdo rje rnam thar tshad med dang// sems dang de bzhin mnyam pa yi// shes rab 'khor dang dpal gyi dkyil// de bzhin rim par rdo rje yi// glu gar la sogs yo byad kyis// mchod dang 'jug tshul gong ma bzhin// cha rnams dus las mi 'da' bar// lha yi nyi ma rnams la'o// bde ba chen po la sogs pa// tshom bu'ang yang na phyag rgya rnams// spyir ram re rer sbyar bar bya// 'das la rnam thar tshogs bskul te// da lta byung dang mi 'byung la// tshad med sems dang mnyam par bskrun// mnyam pa'i rgyal por de 'gyur te// bde gshegs dus kyi

rgyal por 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje/ nyi zla'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni nyi zla'i tshogs su mthong ngo// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub sems dang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yin par shes par gyis shigachos thams cad ni byang chub sems las byung zhing snying rje'i rang bzhin can yin no// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje dang byang chub sems kyi don bdag cag la bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams kun gyi yo byad ni// snying rje byang chub sems yin te// yo byad de dag ma ldan na// don rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor byang chub sems rdzogs pa// bcu drug rdzogs pa'i zla rgyas tshul// snying rje ye shes shar ba ni// mkhas la nyi gsal shar ba'i tshul// don gnyis rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rnal 'byor nges pa'i sa pa yin// nges pa'i sa la bgrod pa ni// rdo rje dus kyi rgyun tshogs kyis// tshogs chen rnam gnyis bskrun par bya// skar tshogs dbus na zla nya ba// bcu drug zhag gis rdzogs pa bzhin// bcu gsum rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa// bcu drug tshogs kyis rdzogs pas ni// mdzes pa'i nyi ma bcu drug gis// zla dkyil 'od kyi phyag rgya la// mdzes par spras pa'i bde ba de// bcu drug tshogs kyis bsod nams bskrun// phyed rdzogs tshogs 'phel de phan chad// mi dmagis chos la blo sbyangs yin// je zhi je zhi mi dmigs pa/ mtshan ma shes bya bsrabs pa ste// bsod nams tshogs kyang mi dmigs pa/ mnyam pas stong par gyur pa na// thams cad chos skur rdzogs pa ste// sdug bsngal byang chub gnyis med de// 'di la rmad 'byung sems bskyed de// zla ba dus kyis mtshan ma dang// gsang ba gnyis kyis mchod par bya// phra mo'i drod du byung ba dang// smyur te rang las byung rnams la// rtsa ba gcad phyir yongs rdzogs pas// the tshom med par dang blangs nas/ dus de nyid du nyi ma 'char// dus 'di rgyun gyi bar bcad na// bsnyed pa dag gis bzlog par dka'// bar chad byung na gso zhing bskang// mkha' la zla gsal gra rgyas na// sa la rnal 'byor grar rgyas pas/ bsod nams spel ba chen po dang// bsngo ba chen po'i las rnams bya// de nas 'bras bu chen po yang// nyi zla zhon nas 'gro ba yi// rig 'dzin sa la slebs phan chad// dpal chen bcu

drug sa la 'grub// ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de rgyun du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bzhengs pa dang/ 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yi ge rgyun gyi dkyil 'khor du gnas par mthong ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ni rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin yin la// rgyal ba thams cad ni yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du shes par gyis shig/ gsol ba/ yi ge phyag rgya'i don gang lags pa bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kun rgyal ba'i rang bzhin// rgyal ba sku gsung thugs su gsal// sku gsung thugs dang phyag rgya dag/ yi ge'i phreng ba nyid la rdzogs// yi ge phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rnams// rgyun du bsgrub par bya ba yin// des ni rgyun gyi ting 'dzin thob// rgyun gyi rgyun du mi gcad pa// rdo rje nam dang nyi tshod la// yi ge'i chogs bskyed tshogs sbyar la// phud lhag bcas sbyar de bzhin no// 'di ni don la nye ba'i lam// bsod nams bskrun par de myur ro// kun rdzogs tshogs kyi rgyu des ni// yang dag tshogs chen ci 'dra ba// mchog gi bde ba dam pa dang// de nyid chen por de nyid 'gyur// 'jug sgo spyod dang lta ba mthun// thams cad gcig par gyur pa yi// rgyu dang rkyen ldan phun sum tshogs// mdza' 'phrod sman dang dgyes sbyor ldan// lha dang rig 'dzin rnal 'byor ril// ma lus tshogs pas chos 'di spyad// skad cig yud dam thad cig gam// yud tsam nyin zhag zla re 'am// lha yi nyi ma bkra shis kyi// tshogs la bab pa'i dus 'di dag/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i dus chen yin// ji ltar 'byor pa'i yo byad rnams// phyi dag nang gi khyad par gyis// gtsang ma'i kha zas 'byung po la// rnam rtog rtog bral rgyal ba la// ji ltar 'byor bzhin nan tan bya// bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga dang// chos kyi don du mi 'gyur ba'i// skyon bzhi po dag spangs nas ni// de las bzlog pa'i tshul lda pas// rnal 'byor snying dang mig lta bu// gdung pa'i 'du shes nyer bzhag ste// ji bzhin 'dod pa'i nye bar sbyar// lha rnams nye bar bya ba dang// bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba dang// don grub shi ba gso ba'i phyir// las 'dir spyad par shin tu gces// tshogs 'di blo chung gsar zhugs pa'i// mdun du brjod par bya mi rigs// rdzas dang yo byad thams kyang// cis 'dus de ltar stobs kyis spyad// des na las 'di khyad par yang// tshogs la tshogs bskyed sgrib sbyangs te// bsnyen pa dag la goms byas nas// bsgrubs pas 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'o// zhes bka' stsal to// rgyud kyi

rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rigs pa'i mdo las rnal 'byor bde ba'i tshogs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang smra ba'i seng ge sems dpa'i rdo rje de 'das pa brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngags zab mo spyod pa'i skyon dang yon tan ci lags par bdag cag gi rig pa la snang bar gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gsang sngags chen po'i don ni rab tu spyad par dka' bar shes par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na// gsang sngags kyi tshogs ni shin tu me dang 'dra ste// me ni rgyun du bcangs shing spyad legs na ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rgyun du spyad du yod do// me nyid ji lta ba bzhin du spyad na me'i phung po chen por 'gyur te// spyod par byed pa nyid kyang bsregs/ khyim nas khyim yang bsregs/ rdzas kyi dngos po thams cad kyang bsregs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gsang sngags 'di ni chu dang 'dra ste/ chu thabs kyis zan cing spyad legs na ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dga' bder spyad du yod de// chu la dga' ba der thar chu chen po la 'brogs par nus so// chu'i rang bzhin dang thabs la ma gos pas ni spyod par byed pa de g.yeng zhing 'chi bar byed do// gzhan yang gsang sngags chen po 'di ni gcan gzan gdug pa can dang 'dra ste// gcan gzan gyis sems can gzhan gyi srog gcod par byed pa yang thabs la mkhas pas ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du dbang du 'du'o// thabs kyis ma zin na srog gcod par byed do// gzhan yang gsang sngags chen po 'di ni sbrul gyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ste/ sbrul gyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu thabs kyis yongs su zin na ni dbang du 'du zhing spyad du yod la// thabs kyis ma zin na ni 'tsho ba srog dang 'bral bar byed do// de bas na gsang ba chen po 'di ni spyad par dka' bas sngon gyi dus kyi tshe na yang spyad nyes pa'i log pa'i lam pa can mang por byung ngo// don dang lam la mkhas pa'i skyes bus thabs kyis zin cing spyad legs na ma nor ba'i lam du zhugs pa yang mang por byur bas 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs spyad pa'i thabs la yongs su mkhas par gyis shigade skad ces bka' stsal dang/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags log pa'i lam las byung ba ni gang gang lags/ spyad legs pa'i thabs las byung ba ni gang gang lags/ bdag cag la rgya cher bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das [(]25[)]

kyis 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs nyes legs kyi rim pa bshad par bya yis nyon cig ces bka' stsal pa dang/ nga ni dran pa thog ma'i tshe/ gsang pa spyod pa'i don 'di dag nges don phal cher nub par gyur/ tshul 'dra tsam zhig gnas pa la// kun kyang phal cher spyod mod kyang// don dang phyad pa ngas ma mthong// kun kyang log pa'i lam spyad do// log pa can nyid gang zhe na// 'di la mi gnas 'di nyams dang/ 'di las log dang logs tshul spyod// 'di tshul ma yin 'dir ma nges// g.yo sgyus bden bcos 'gal ba'i lam// de yang ji ltar bu zhe na// bskal pa kun bkod bya ba'i tshe// sangs rgyas mngon byung rgyal po de// mya ngan 'das par gyur 'og tu// byung ba'i rnal 'byor bzang rgyan de// mi shes byis pa'i 'khor rnams la// tshul 'chos log pa'i tshogs bskyangs pas// tshom bu lnga brgyar bcas pa zhig/ don las gol zhing 'khor bar log/ de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ rmad byung mkhas pa'i bstan pa 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshad ma rnams// phal cher mi gnas skabs dag tu// mi shes ngan rtog can rnams kyis// dkrugs 'gyur bka' bslad bzhung por te// nor pas bdag nyid sun 'byin cing// bdag yin gzhan 'di ma yis zhes// bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa log/ de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bskal pa de nyid dus dag la// rnal 'byor dpa' sbyin bya ba zhig/ don la blo shed ma bye zhing// lam gyi thabs las mi mkhas pas// nges don bka' yi gzhung bor nas// chos ma yin pa'i chos spyod cing// gzhan dag nges don spyod pa la// khyod kyi de ni don ma yin// don mchog bdud rtsi gang yin pa// de ni nga yi chos 'di yin// zhes ni bdag bstod gzhan la smod// 'di yang srid pa log pa'i lam// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ sngar byung rgyud kyi rjes gnas pas// rdeng med bzhin du dpon bstabs na// tshig gnyer dregs pa'i dbang des ni// mi shes bzhin du ras gcod pa'i// tshul 'chos sems kyi gya gyu can// smyon thabs blun pa'i sdeg can yin// de yang ji ltar bu zhe na// dge slong dri med spyod pa zhes// bya ba'i rnal 'byor tshul 'dra zhig/ don la mkhas pa'i rjes su byung// tshom bu 'bum gyi 'khor rnams kyis// rgyud kyi rjes su byung ba yis// don med dge slong de nyid la// tshig gi gnyer chen ljid phab pas// gdung 'tshob ces ni dpon bstabs te// che ba chen po'i dregs pa skyes// mi shes bzhin du tshul bcos te// 'dra tshul log pa'i chos spyad pas// tshom bu 'bum dang bcas pa zhig/ dreg pa chen po'i ru drar lhung// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ mdza' 'drin bslang ster zhing rnams dang// rnyed

dang bkur stes 'tsho ba'i 'khor// gzhan gyi dbang du gyur dogs nas/ sgo ris rkyang chen so sor gcod// 'khor 'di bdag gis smin bya yi// gdul bar bya ba'i zhing yin gyis// gang dag 'di dang ma 'brel zhes// nyon mongs tshig gis sgo byed nor// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rnam 'byor na zhi gnas pa zhes// bya ba'i tshom bu lnga brgya zhig/ shin tu gsang sngags spyod do zhes// dgon pa'i gnas su 'du gnas ni// yul khams chen po de dag gis// gnas par gyur pa'i mi rnams kun// gdul bar bya ba'i zhing du spyod// gzhan gyi sde par gyur pa yi// dge slong don dang ldan pa zhig/ yul der ched du 'ongs nas ni// rnal 'byor nges pa'i lam mchog gcig/ rgya cher bstan par bsam pa las/ dge slong dgon par gnas pa des// nyon mongs tshig gi bsgo ba byas// 'khor 'di bdag gi zhing yin gyis// khyod ni 'di la ma gtogs zhes// sgo dang tshan dang ris bcad pas// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i la du lhung// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ rnal 'byor chen por bsngos gyur la/ sna 'gas ci rgyal gsog 'jog byed// gcig yid gcig gis 'byin byed pa// nam zhar longs spyod thob pa min// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rnal 'byor bde ldan shes pa zhes// bya ba'i tshom bur bcas pa zhig/ gsang ba rgya cher spyod pa las// 'khor na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma// bud med bzang ldan bya ba zhig/ tshogs sbyor ging du bskos pa las// 'byor ba'i yo byad de dag la// ser sna'i sems kyis gsog 'jog byas// las kyi rnam smin de yis ni// yi dwags khyi yi lus su skyes// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ gzhan yang rnal 'byor chen po'i tshogs// log par spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ni// log lta spyi brtol gtum khro che// sdig spyod don dang mi ldan yang// bdag ni yang dag yin no zhes// bab chol bka' rku slu byed bslad// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ chos skyong ba yi rnal 'byor pa// pra ma de zhes bya ba zhig/ don dang lam la mi mkhas par// bdag ni mkhan po yin no zhes// kun la rgya cher sgra bsgrags nas// rgyal ba'i bka' brkus 'gro ba rnams// bslus par gyur pa'i rnam smin gyis// log pa can gyi 'jig rten pa// mi stegs spyod pa'i khams su lhung// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ tha tshig nyams shing don la rmugs// dregs pas don la khas 'ches phyir// rdo rje rgyal dbang thob 'dod pa// khrel med spyi brtol mun sprul 'chal// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rnal 'byor sngags kyi tshul spyod pa// pe na ya zhes bya ba bzhig/ tshom bu brgya dang bcas pa byung/ rtsa ba nyams shing don la rmugs// dregs pa chen po'i nga rgyal gyis// don la mkhas pa'i tshul bcos phyir// rdo rje rgyal po'i dbang mnos

pas// ri bos srog chags mnan pa bzhin// nga rgyal dregs pa'i ri bo yis// 'khor ba'i las spyod las ngan pa'i// srog chags phag gi rigs su lhung// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ mnyam pa'i don nyid ma rtogs par/ tshig du mnyam zhes rjod byed cing// chags sdang gnyis la mngon 'chel ba// rnal 'byor las kyis 'khor ba'i lam// de yang ji ltar bu zhe na// dge slong bde sbyin bya ba zhig/ tshom bu stong dang bcas par de// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i las la spyod// la la chags la mngon par 'chel// la las sdang chen gsod par spyod// chags sdang las kyi rnam smin gyis// rak+Sha srin pa'i khams su+u lhung// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ gang dag rnal 'byor blo chug rnams// rdo rje gral tshogs don glengs na// de la 'jigs shing skrag 'gyur te// spa zhum mi dga' 'byol byed blun// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// dge slong lhas byin bya ba zhig/ rnal 'byor dang po'i sar slob tshe// rnal 'byor don ldan mang po rnams// phal cher tshogs par gyur pa la// nges don gsang ba'i don glengs na// lhas byin 'khor bcas de las byol// don gleng ba la mi dga' zhing// ngan pa'i sems kyis phrag dog skyes// rang gi gnas su song nas ni// mkhas pa de la mi snyan brjod// las kyi rnam smin de yis ni// bskal pa dpag tu med pa ru// yang dag don las gol bar 'gyur// 'khor ba don med gnas su 'khyams// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ rnal 'byor nyid kyis rnal 'byor la// shin tu gdug pa'i dug mdas gtong// tha tshig btsan po rdzong lta bu// 'joms byed rnal 'byor rang bges so// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rnal 'byor rnam dag blo gros zhes// bya ba'i don ldan mkhas pa zhig/ mi 'jigs blo gros zhes bya ba'i// thabs dang don la mi mkhas pa// sde pa mang po skyong ba'i sar// rnam dag blo gros 'khor bcas 'ongs// mkhas pa don ldan bzod thob la// ngan sems phyar ka'i sgro skur btab// las kyi rnam smin de yis ni// mi 'jigs blo gros mnar me lhung// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ lta ba dmigs bu dang bral bas// yang dag dbu ma'i lam mi gsal// spyi yul tsam la ltos spyod pa// de ni rnal 'byor long pa'i tshogs// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rgyal po rab gsal 'dzin pa zhes// bya ba'i rnal 'byor can zhig byung// shes rab lta ba'i med med par// rnal 'byor ming tsam tshul bzung nas// sgra thos tsam gyi gzhung spyad pas// mig med 'khor ba'i khams su lhung// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ de la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// log pa'i tshogs su spyad pas ni// 'khor ba log pa'i tshus su 'gyur// de na 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// shin tu gsang

ba'i chos 'di rnams// gol sa che bar rgyal bas bshad// thabs la mkhas par spyod pa yis// don dang ldan par bya ba gces// thabs la mkhas par spyad pa yi// legs pa'i lam gyi rnal 'byor pa// sngon 'das dus na byung ba yi// rtsal can rnams kyi don bshad pa// skyes bu mchog gi spyod pa 'di// yon tan sgra bsgrags sus thos pa// ming tsam gyis kyang de thob cing// dran pas ngan 'gro las skyob yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// shin tu gsang ba'i spyod pa 'di// lha gnas gsum du grags pa las// lha yi bu ni 'od ldan te// mi rtag 'chi ba'i dus bab nas// 'chi ka'i snga ltas byung ba'i tshe// mi dga' bar ni 'du shes gyur// phyi ma'i 'du shes skyed pa las// mi gtsang zas su za ba yi// blun pa'i srog chags lus len par// rang gi mngon par shes pas mthong// shin tu 'jigs pa'i 'du shes kyis// skyabs kyi yul rnams yid la byas// gzhan gyi dran pa mi gsal bar// gsang ba chen po'i tshogs chen gyis// mtshan ni rna ba'i dbang po thos// thos pa yid la dran byas pas// ngan 'gro'i lam las slar log ste// tshogs chen spyod pa'i skal ldan pas// gsang ba 'dzin pa'i gnas su skyes// de bzhin thos pa dag par spyod// rgyal ba mnyes pa'i tshogs 'di la// gang zhig dga' zhing 'dun skyed pa// gzhan gyi bar chad mi 'byung bar// ji ltar mos pa de myur 'thob// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bram ze'i bu ni byams ldan te// gsang ba chen po'i tshogs 'di dag/ spyod par mos nas kun tu btsal// btsal bas rnyed par ma gyur te// sa phyogs zhig tu 'dug nas ni// shin tu ngus nas smras pa ni// e ma'o bdag gi las re pham// skyes nas rgas par gyur bar du// tshogs chen zab mo'i don btsal na// don dang ma phrang las re ngan// da 'ong ji ltar btsal na rnyed// btsal byas rnyed par yong mi 'gyur// thugs rjes bdag la skyabs su 'chi// gdung ba sgra cher phyung ba las// nam mkha'i khams nas sgra phyung ste// skal dang ldan pa'i bram ze khyod// de ltar yi dam la brten pa// khyod ni don gyi skal pa can// dus gsum rgyal ba'i thams cad kyis// khyod la byin gyis rlob par mdzad// de bas lta ba ma g.yel bar// sgrib pa sbyang ba'i thabs dag la// mkhas shing brtson par bya dgos te// rang gi rtsa rnams bkros nas ni// khrag chen dag gis mchod pa de// 'dod chags dag pa tsan+dan chus// dmigs nas rgyal ba kun mchod nas// de ma thag tu don thob 'gyur// de skad lung bstan thob nas ni// dga' ba'i bsam pa cher g.yos te// lung bstan pa ltar de spyad pas// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i sras su gyur// de bzhin mos pa dag par spyod// mthong la skal ldan 'dir zhugs

pa// thams cad du yang de bzhin te// tog ni rtse mor gyur pa bzhin// yongs kyi nub pa ma yin no// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// lha yi bu zhes bya ba ni// dge ba'i rgyal po bya ba de// tshom bu 'bum dang bcas pa zhig/ gsang ba rgya cher spyad pa las// lha bu rin chen 'od ldan de// shin tu dad pa cher g.yos te// lha rdzas yo byad mang po dang// bcas nas gsang ba'i gnas der phyin// dga' zhing 'dun pa'i tshul gyis ni// gus par gyur te der gnas pas// cho 'phrul chen po bzhi thob ste// lha gnas kun du bgrod pa dang// 'byung chen lus las sprul pa dang// ri bo gdeg dang 'phang ba dang// mi 'chi tshe la gnas pa thob// rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i tog bzhin du// mthong ba dag pa'i chos de nyid// bska par nub par ma gyur ro// de bzhin 'jug pa dag par gyis// mthong bas chos 'di yongs dag pas// ye shes sgron ma'i mig rnyed nas// bla med snying po can rnams kyis// lam rnyed lam du zhugs pa bzhin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bram ze kun ri bya ba zhig/ chos kyi mig ldan don mthong nas// gsang chen gzhung bzhin spyod pa la// bram ze kai ni bya ba zhig/ dad pas don gyi rjes su 'brengs// gsang chen 'dus pa'i tshogs mthong ba// chos kyi mig dang ldan 'gyur te// don gyi snying po mthong bar 'gyur// lhun grub rtsal chen rdzogs pa yi// rig 'dzin chen po'i sa nyid thob// de bzhin mthong bas dag par gyis// gzhan dag 'dir ni mngon spyod la// dga' ba'i yid kyis phyogs byed pa// de ni dngos dang 'dra ba ste// 'bras bu la yang mtho dman med// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ldan zhes// bya ba'i rnal 'byor can zhig la// tshom bu bcu dang bcas pa'i 'khor// rig 'dzin spyod pa'i don la zhugs// sngags spyod 'bras bu cher thob ste// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul mang po dag/ thob pa kun tu grags par 'gyur// de la gzhan gyi sde pa yi// bram ze dge slob bya ba zhig/ shin tu dag pa'i sems bskyed nas// 'jug cing bslab par zhugs pa las// rgyal pos ma gnang gsang sgo bsdams// bram ze dad pa ma log par// 'byor pa'i yo byad ci yod rnams// rgyal po 'khor du phul nas kyang// rgyal po gnas pa'i yul phyogs su// yid kyi phyogs te smon lam btab// rtse gcig par ni smon lam btab// rjes su yi rang dam par ni// yid la byas pa'i bsod nams kyis// sgrub par byed pa'i rgyal po dang// sgrub dang mi ldan bram ze gnyis// 'bras bu mtho dman med par thob// 'di ni tshegs med don po che// thabs la mkhas pa'i rig 'dzin yin// de bzhin spyod pa gzhan dag la// dga' bas rjes su yi rang gis// dge ba spyad dang ma spyad gnyis// 'bras bu mnyam

por thob par gyur// bsam yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rgyal rnams 'dir bslab 'dir mkhyen pas// srid gsum 'gro ba'i bshes gnyen du// kun gyi bdag por gyur pa yin// de yang ji ltar bu zhe na// sngon gyi bram ze gsal byin gyis// gsang chen 'di yi don bslabs nas// rang gi sems la goms byas nas// sems nyid bden pa'i don mthong ste// chos rnams kun la mkhas par 'gyur ro// kun gyi rtsa ba sems yin pas// sems las chos byung 'bum phrag yas// chos kyi rgyal por der gyur nas// sangs rgyas smra ba'i seng ge zhes// zhing khams kun tu grags par 'gyur// de bzhin bslab par dag par gyis// tshogs chen gcig gi bsod nams ni// skye la nyan thos bsam yas la// sbyin pa'i tshogs chen spel bas ni// 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do// ci phyir zhen gcig mnyes pas// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa yin// nam mkha' khyab pa'i rgyal ba dang// nyag gcig snang ba'i rgyal ba gnyis// so so ma yin tha mi dad// sku dang gsung thugs gcig las med// 'dul ba'i ngo gang khyad par las// bsam gyis mi khyab bstan par zad// de na khyad par de ltar snang// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// las rnams dag pa'i bram ze ni// dge ldan gsal ldan bya ba gnyis// dga' ba'i dad pa so sor skyes// gcig la gcig ni tha tshig byas// gcig gis nyan thos bsam yas la// mchod sbyin bya ba rgya cher byas// gcig gis tshogs mchod rgya cher byas// tshogs la spyod pa'i gsal ldan ni// 'di tshe gcig la mngon sangs rgyas// sbyin pa spel ba'i dge ldan ni// bskal pa grangs med gsum gyis grub// de bas gnas 'dir spyod pa dag/ rnal 'byor gsal ldan tshul bzhin spyod// 'di dag rtag tu su 'chang ba// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i// che yon rtag tu ci 'dra bar// don gyi gzugs dang bcas par 'thob// de yang ji lta du zhe na// khyim bdag mes sbyin bya ba de// tshom bu brgya dang bcas pa zhig/ rgyun gyi rtag par 'di spyad pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' ni// 'khor dang bcas pa ci 'dra bar// skye ba de yis nges par thob// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// don du nges par sgrub pa'i tshogs// rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa// goms dang brjod dang smos pa yis// chos kyi rgyal por de 'gyur zhing// yon tan spyi gtsug nyid du 'gyur// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ drang srong rnal 'byor kal ya nas// drang srongs rnam pa mang po la// tshogs 'di yon tan rgya cher bsgrags// don rnams nges par bshad pa las// drang srong mang pos rig 'dzin thob// ston par byed pa'i kal ya na// gsang bdag chos kyi rgyal por gyur// 'on tang gsang ba'i don 'di dag/ snod dang

ldan pa'i 'gro ba la// bstan tam bshad dam brjod par gyis// des ni yon tan chen po dang/ nga yi spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur// des na 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs dam ni// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i tshogs 'di yin// rnal 'byor gang zhig blo ldan pas// skad cig tsam mam thang cig la// rgyal ba'i tshogs 'di rab bskrun na// rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang// rig 'dzin rnal 'byor mtha' dag dang// tha tshig zab mo skongs nas kyang// chos kyi mig ni thob par 'gyur// de ni tshogs spyad yon tan dang// log par spyad pa'i skyon rnams ni// sngon byung gleng gzhi bshad pa yin// zhes sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las 'das pa sngon byung gi le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de'i zhal du shin tu re zhing bka' sdod pa'i tshul gyis lta zhing kun du brjid par 'khor gyis bskul ba'i sa la sta gon du gnas shing cang mi smra bar gyur tau// de nas 'khor phal po ches rnam par bskul bar rig nas rnal 'byor gyi phyag lus kun sa la brdabs nas a la la ho zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung nas mgrin gcig tu gsol ba btab pa// e ma rdo rje sems chen po// rang rig mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'bar// mgon po yon tan bsam las 'das// rgyal thob khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma rang snang dbyer med sku?// rnam dag bsod nams mtshan gyis brgyan// dpe byad 'bru bkod blta mi ngoms// sku lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma rnam dag nam mkha'i dbyings// gcig gsung sna tshogs sgrar rig mkhyen// bsam 'das brjod med rdo rje'i gsung// gsung lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma gsang ba nam mkha'i thugs// mnyam nyid mi g.yo so sor gsal// kun rig snying po ye shes mchog/ thugs lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma mi mdzad mdzad pa che// ma chags chags bral 'dod chags mdzod// thams cad sgrol ba'i las chen po// phrin las mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal tshab khyod la gsol ba ni// byams mgon thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis// sprul pa'i go tshags ru mnyam ste// 'khor ba'i skyas lings chen po la// sdug bsngal shin tu gsad pa'i phyir// thams cad dur khrod chen po ru// byin gyis brlabs pa'i las chen mdzod// a ho zhes gsol ba btab pa las/ sems dpa' rdo rje chen po des rnal 'byor pa'i phyag byas nas// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la zhus pa// a la la ho bde ba chen po'i mchog gsang ba kun gyi rgyal po/ yang gsang bla na med

pa'i bdag nyid/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rmad du byung ba'i tshig shin tu rtul phod pa gsol ba 'chal ba 'di shin tu ngo mtshar lags so// 'di dag 'dul ba'i dbang du dgongs te/ ji ltar 'tshal ba'i bsam pa rangs par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des kun du 'dul ba'i 'dus mkhyen nas bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i 'khor gyis bskor ba dur khrod rgyan gyi rol pa las rmad du byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i tshig 'di gsungs so// hU~M he he phaT/ hU~M hU~M bi shwa badzra kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Dal la A ra li a li u li ta pa li tra~M s+t+wa~M/ kha li ho/ na sha sta~M b+ha ya hU~M/ bru~M phu tsa kha hi phaT phaT ha la hU~M zhes gsungs so// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa thams cad dur khrod kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur nas/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ shin tu rnam par 'thor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'khor gzhan gyis yid tshod du mi 'gyur ba'i sku'i chos bstan pa ni sku kun du dur khrod kyi bdag po chen por bsgyur nas dur khrod kyi gnas brgyad dang// he ru ka'i gnas bcu dang// dpal gyi chas brgyad dang// dur khrod kyi rgyan chen po dgu dang/ don gyi rtags chen po bco brgyad dang// dur khrod kyi longs spyod sna tshogs pa bstan pas zhal 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis gzigs pa las saims dpa' rdo rje des mkhyen te// bka' gsang dbang chen 'dis don du ni bshad/ tshig tu bsgrags par rig nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la shin tu ldem dgongs kyi tshig tu smras pa// bka' gsang rmad byung chen po 'di sbas pas zab cing rtogs dka' ba// mtshon pas don 'byin mi shes pas// nyon mongs rang dga' spyod snyam pa'i// shin tu byis pa'i blo zhan pa'i// nges pa'i shes rab mig ldongs te// don gyi rtsal shugs chung ba yis// dga' bde'i longs spyod bskrun snyam nas// mtshan ma rang dgar spyad bsgrubs kyang// rang bzhin 'grub par mi 'gyur te// rgyud phung 'bras bu tshig gyur nas// myu gu brlag ste ga la 'byung// gtan tshig de bas 'di don dag/ rtsal zhan dag la bstan min zhes// gsang bdag rgyal po kun gsung na// ci khyod rnams kyis mi shes sam// zhes rnam par smras pa las// 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis slar gsol pa// e ma'o sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i rgyu tshig chen po dag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang dam pa 'dir gsung ngam/ 'on te mi spyod dam cang ma lags grang/ ci blang dor mdzad dam/ e ma snod du ma gyur pa ni gang mchis/ thams cad byang chub kyi snying po can lags

na/ thong kun rab tu thong/ rnam par rab tu gsungs/ 'gag pa mi mnga' mi 'gog gsungs// ci phyir mi gsung thogs med sras// rgyal ba'i sras po dus 'di lags// gsang ba'i snying po snod 'di lags// bka' gsang dkyil 'khor gnas 'di lags// gsang ba'i dur khrod tshul 'di lags// snying rje zher sems khyaud la 'dud// gsang ba yang gsang khyod la 'dud// gsang ba ye gsang khyod la 'dud// dkyil 'khor rgyal po khyod la 'dud// 'khor lo snying po khyod la 'dud// gsang chen snying po tshul ci lags// bka' gsang dkyil 'khor thabs ci lags// 'bras bu bde ba'i don ci lags/[ ]ma 'ongs pa yi rnal 'byor dag/ bsgrubs na dang len 'tshal ba yi// rig par 'gyur ba'i thabs ci lags// 'byung chen rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab pa las// sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa de shin tu bzhad pa chen pos rnam par bzhad de// a a he he'i gad rgyangs bsgrags pas 'khor thams cad kyang gad rgyangs gyi sgra chen po sgrogs par mdzad de// dgyes pa'i 'od zer las shes rab kyi dpal de dgyes pa'i rol mo sna tshogs ling long phyad par byung ngo// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa de lus kun bsrang ste/ dur khrod kyi chas sna tshogs bsar zhing rtags bco brgyad 'bar bar byas nas brjid pa'i gsung gis gsang sngags rgya mtsho dang/ rnam grangs sna tshogs don gyi bsgrub pa rtags kyi rol pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dag bshad do// gcig tu+u yang dag nges grub pa'i// don la rton byed rnal 'byor rnams// thogs med nyid du 'grub 'dod pa// ji ltar btso blag mkhan dag gis// ras dkar sbyangs pas tshon 'jen ltar// rnal 'byor las rnams dang por ni// skongs dang sbyong ba'i las rnams gces// zab mor 'jug pa'i sngon logs nas// sems nyid gting nas tshar gcad phyir// theg pa dman pa'i skye bo dang// lhan cig ci la'ang mi brnal lo// de las gyur pa'i yo byad dag/ rus sbal mgo la 'ongs pa dag/ shin tu 'khrugs pa'i sems chen gyis// rgya mtshos bshugs te spang bar bya// gal te gang zag dbang gis na// nyams pa'i chad par byung ba na/ mgon tshun chos nyid chu phab nas// skong zlog cho ga rgya cher bya// sgrub rtsom sngon nam yang sngon nam// zhag grangs dag gi sngon logs nas// sdig sbyangs byang chub sems bskyed de// dge ba'i don la 'dun par bya// slong mo dang slong la dga' ba// slong la 'tsho ba'i tshe spyod rnams// sde dang tshan dang grar byas te/ snying rje lud pa'i zhing du bya// sman dang 'bru dang rtsi rnams dang// bcud kyi mchog tu gyur pa dag/ btags sam phye mar sbyar nas kyang// klung ngam chu klung mtsho chen

du// dor te chags med spyin par bya// dge ba'i yon bdag dang blangs te// nad gso shes slob spyod sgom grwa// gtsugs te bsti gnas mchog bya zhing// dus kyi 'khor lo'i mchod chen bya// gsung sgra rgya mtsho sgrogs pa yi// glegs bam zab mo kun bsten te// brjod dang bsnyen bkur bsti gnas kyis// rgya chen yangs pa'i las rnams bya// ye shes tshogs rnams rdzogs bya'i phyir// shes rab tshogs kyi sbyin mchog dag/ bstan tam glegs bam la sogs pa'i// blo mchog ldan pa rnams la sbyin// bsgom dang goms par bya ba yis// kun gzhi dag par bya ba'i phyir// ting 'dzin bye ba mang po la// blo mchog yid kyi rtsal de spyad// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te// rgyud sbyang lhag pa'i shes rab blta// sho gam srang dang sho gam lam// mi bde'i gnod pa kun gsal te// tshad med snying rje'i 'khor lo bskor// sbyin pa'i 'khor lo rgyun mi gcad// chu 'am sa'am nam mkha' 'am// me 'am de bzhin rlung rnams la// sku gdung spel mchod ring bsrel rnams/ brtsam pa'i las chen 'khor lo bya// mtshan med zlog par byed pa yi// lus sems rgyud la rdul rlags te// 'phags pa'i spyin tshogs pho brang du// rdul snyed lus kyis mchod sems bshags// rgyal mnyes las ni gyis shig pa// thams chen sbyong pa'i las chen las// rnam bzhi me yi las mchog bya// des ni mtshams med zlog pa yin// thugs rje 'byung ba'i 'khor lo dag/ gang ltar goms ltar 'bad rtsol bya// bstan pa skyong ba'i tshogs rnams la// sbyin mchod spel ba'i las rnams bya// de la sogs pa'i dge ba'i tshogs// don du mi 'gyur kun spangs la// nan tan tshogs kyi dpung chen bskyed// 'di ltar las chen ltang sogs pa// gzhan du bskyed pa ma yin te/ rtse gcig don ldan rnal 'byor pa// rgyud ldan snod ldan bya phyir dang// gal te rtsal zhan ma grub na// dge bsags ltang chen kun bsdoms te// las kyi bsags pa don bgrangs shing// gdung ba'i shugs phyung rtsal sprugs nas// nyi shar chu klung zla brnyan ltar// rang bzhin shugs kyis 'grub par gces// de phyir phra mo yan chad kyang// bdag gi don du 'gyur bar bya// de ltar spyad pa spyod yi// phra mo'i rnal 'byor blo 'phel ba// chung ngu chung sogs mthar zang nas// skong pa'i rnal 'byor 'khor lo yis// zhig dang ral dang chags 'dres dag/ bskang gso gzhug pa'i las 'di bya// las chen skong pa'i khyad par gyis// gnas su brtag par nges med de// mi sdug skyon can bkra mi shis// spangs te med par gyur pa yi// shin tu sar pa'i gnas chen dag/ bskang pa'i gnas su de 'gyur ro// de ltar yid 'ong gnas btsal nas// drod ldan bla ma spyan drangs te// sri zhu

rgyal chos spyi bor bkur// de yang dmigs kyis zhu ba dag/ maN+Dal khar bsil tsam dag la// me long snying por ltar byas te// gtsang ma'i rgyu las rdzas byas pa// yid 'ong rnam lnga'i mchod pa la// rkyen gyi rnal 'byor sna tshogs kyis// brgyan te bklubs pa'i sprin phung rnams// mnyes nas skong phyir rgyal la dbul// phyi 'khor skyong pa'i mgon po la// 'dod yon lnga la sogs pa yi// yid bzhin longs spyod rkyen dang bcas// yon tan cha las smon bcol mchod// mnyes nas skongs pa'i stongs su 'gyur// khams gsum snying rje'i gnas rnams la// yo byad sbyin tshogs chen po las// 'dod pa'i bsam pa rangs byas na// mgu bas skongs ba'i stongs su 'gyur/ bgegs su gyur pa'i gegs ris kyang// mnyam pa'i don gyis sems mi dbyung// dmigs kyis kha zas sna tshogs las// bgegs rnams mgu na thams cad kyang// mnyam pa'i don gyis skongs pa'i rgyur// cung zad tsam du snang ba yin// de ltar skongs pa'i las rnams kyis// bskang bar bya ba'i dmigs rnams ni// rnam pa lngar ni snang ba ste// kun du nyams pa chen po dang// rtsa ba nyams dang yan lag nyams// de bzhin zlas nyams zhar nyams lnga// bskang ba'i thabs kyang lnga yod de// spyad pa'i las kyis bskang ba dang// rdzas dang don dang ting 'dzin dang// man ngag gsang ba'i thabs chen no// de dag la yang lnga lnga ste// spyod pa'i tshul gyis bskang ba la// rnam par lnga ru bshad par bya// dang po 'bum lnga khri gsum ste// rtsa nyams khri lnga stong gsum mo// yan lag nyams par gyur pa la// stong lnga brgya gsum thon par bya// bzlas nyams brgya lnga bcu gsum mo// zhar gyis nyams par gyur pa la// bcu lnga gcig gsum dag gis skongs// rdzas kyis bskang ba'i thams mchog ni// gal te bsrung ba 'ga' zhig las// byang chub tsha thig ral gyur na/ gti mug rigs kyi tha tshig bskang// dmangs rigs bla ma spyan drangs la// nyes 'gal mi bcab stong du bshags// gser la sogs pa'i rdzas chen gyis// tha tshig gang brlag nor des blu// byang chub sems bskyed rgyud sbyang mnyan// rdo rje tha tshig ral gyur na// zhes sdang rigs kyi tha tshig bskang// rje'u rigs bla ma spyan drangs te// nyes byas mi bcab 'bum du bshags// shel la sogs pa'i rdzas chen gyis// tha tshig gang brlag nor des blu// bsam gtan ting 'dzin bsgom brtson bya// rin chen tha tshig nyams gyur na/ nga rgyal rigs kyi tha tshig bskang// rgyal rigs bla ma spyan drangs te// nyes byas mi bcab brgyad khrir bshags// baiDUr la sogs rdzas chen gyis// tha tshig gang brlag nor des blu// sku gdung ring bsrel rnam par spel// pad+ma'i tha tshig ral gyur na// 'dod

chags rigs kyi tha tshig bskang// gdol rigs bla ma spyan drangs la// nyes byas mi bcab brgyar bshags bya// byi ru la sogs rdzas chen gyis// tha tshig gang brlag nor des blu// bshad bya zab mo'i glegs bam brjod// las kyi tha tshig ral gyur na// phra dog rigs kyi tha tshig bskang// bram ze rigs bshes spyan drangs la// nyes byas mi bcab bcu lngar bshags// in+d+ra la sogs rdzas rnams kyis// tha tshig gang brlag nor des blu// mchod sbyin bsod nams las chen bya// des ni bskang ba'i las chen 'grub// don gyis bskang ba'i thabs mchog kyang// rnam lnga'i tshul du bshad par bya// chos kun nam mkhar bsgoms nas kyang// bag chags bzang ngan thams cad kun// ci yang med par blo la bzhag/ de la goms byas nyes pa med// kun la mkhas pa'i bla ma la// rgya che yangs pa'i chos mnyan te// bsam pa'i las rnams rgya cher bya// yid kyis dmigs pa'i las dag na// rtsa ba nyams pa skong bar 'gyur// gal te yan lag nyams gyur na// chos nyid nam mkha'i don ston pa'i// glegs bam zab mo kun brtags te// don rnams rgya cher brtag par bya// de ni yan lag nyams pa med// bzlas na tha tshig nyams gyur na// bla ma skyes bu mkhas pa la// gzhung chen tshugs pa'i bstan pa zhig/ ston pa'i yon bdag gnyer blangs te// blo yi rtsal can kun bsdus te// dam chos bdud rtsi bstan par bsgrags// gal te zhar gyis nyams gyur na// bstan pa'i glegs bam rgya chen rnams// bris nas chos kyi sbyin par bya/ des ni zhar nyams skongs par 'gyur// ting 'dzin rtsal gyi thabs mchog ni// bag chags can gyi spyi gtsug tu// rtsa dmar 'od ni me long tsam// shin tu 'bar zhing 'char gsal bas// chags dang bcas pa'i phung po bsregs// rnam grol sems kyi rang bzhin dang// 'od kyi rang bzhin gcig pa las// dkar dang dmar dang mthing ga yi// 'od kyi thig le gsum du 'gyur// dkar por spros pas khyab pa che// dmar por spros pas chags pa che// mthing ga thugs kyi sa bon te// rnam gsum gcig tu 'dus pa las// ngag yid gsum gyi bag chags bsregs// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig skongs// dkar po rlung zla'i dkyil 'khor la// dmar po 'bud pa'i rlung byung bas// mtshan ma'i bag chags rnam par gtor// dmar po chu zla'i dkyil 'khor las// mthong ga ye shes chu byung bas// dngos po'i ljan ljin thams cadabakrus// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang// rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// rdzas bsreg pa la me dgos kyang ma// bag chags tshig la me mi dgos// rig pa ye shes me byung bas// mtshan ma yi ni bud shing bsregs// 'jig rten gtor la

rlung dgos kyang// mtshan ma gtor la rlung mi dgos// rig pa'i ye shes rlung byung bas// mtshan ma'i rdul tshogs rnam par 'phyag/ lus bkru ba la chu dgos kyang// sems bkru ba la chu mi dgos// mnyam nyid chu bo khrus kyi rdzing// ye shes chu bo'i rgyun byung bas// bag chags ljan ljin thams cad bkrus// oM kro d+hi shwa ri sarba pA pa~M sho d+ha ya oM AHhU~M:ra~M ya~M kha~M/ de skad tshig tu brjod pa yis// nyams pa'i chad pa mi 'byung ngo// gcig tu bskang pa'i las chen yang// rigs kyi rdzas dang yo byad rnams// gnas su bsags nas byin brlabs te// phyi nang mtshams bcad brtan byas nas// so so rigs kyi dam tshig la// 'gal bar gyur pa gang dang gang// mchod dang bshags dang gnong bkur te// yan lag brgyad kyi tshul bzung nas// bsam gtan gnas sbyangs rdzas bsab pa// gti mug rigs kyi dam tshig la// shes nas rtogs par bya rgya las// ma rig log pa'i mthu yis na// tha tshig drag po yal gyu na// pho brang nam mkha'i ling+ga la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// a yi rang bzhin 'od gsal bar// gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na// phaT kyis drag tu brdabs pa yis// 'od 'dril bskal pa'i mkha' gsal bas// gti mug ri bo'i mun bsal te// byang chub myu gu 'bar bar 'gyur// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang// rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// e ma'o bder gshegs tha tshig las// byang chub sems bde gsal 'bar ba// don du mi gtong gzhi bskyed de// sangs rgyas gdung chen rgyun snyam las// ji ltar zla ba ra ri ltar// rgyu las byung ba'i rang bzhin las// byang chub myu gu nub ma khad// gzugs kyi phung po'i zhing khams su// bde mchog mkha' mnyam dbyings chen gsal// gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen las// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// byang chub bskal pa'i thugs dam rnams// skongs 'gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyar// sarba ta thA ga ta pu ta sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang// spyi bo brda'i tshul phyag rgya sbyar// zhe sdang rigs kyi tha tshig las// pho brang rnam shes ling+ga la// rdo rje bum pa'i dbus gnas par// hU~M gi rang bzhin 'od gsal 'bar// gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na// phaT kyis drag tu brdabs pa yis// 'od 'dril rdo rje'i phal lam gyis// zhes sdang ri bo brlags nas kyang// shes rab me long 'od gsal 'bar// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na// rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// e ma'o rdo rje tha tshig rnams// sems chen ye shes gsal 'bar ba// thugs mchog gdung chen rgyud snyam las// ji ltar ral gri so rgal ltar// de las

gyur pa'i rang bzhin las// shes rab me long nub ma khad// rnam shes phung po'i zhing khams su// gsal 'bar ye shes thig le 'phro// gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen gyis// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// thugs mchog bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// skongs gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyang// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang// snying gi brda yi tshul phyag sbyar// nga rgyal rigs kyi dam tshig las// snyoms nas dang du blang rgyu+u las// log pa'i nga rgyal de ma choms// tha tshig drag po yal 'gyur na// pho brang skye rgyu'i ling+ga'i dkyil// rin chen 'bar ba'i dbus gnas par// swa yi rang bzhin 'od gsal 'bar// gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na/ phaT kyis drag tu brdabs pa las// 'od 'dril rin chen 'khor lo yis// nga rgyal de'u chen brlag 'gyur nas// bsod nams ljon shing me tog 'bar// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na// rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// e ma rin chen tha tshig las// bsod nams yon tan 'od 'bar ba// don du mi gtong gzhi bskyed de// rgyu mchog gdung chen rgyud mnyam las// ji ltar mkha' la 'khrigs 'thibs ltar// rgyu las gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis// me tog 'od mdzes yal ma khad// tshor ba'i phung po'i zhing khams su// che ba'i ye shes mnyam 'bar bas// gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen las// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// sku mchog bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang/ skongs gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyang// oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang// 'phral ba brda yi tshul phyag sbyar// 'dod chags rigs kyi dam tshig las// rtogs nas spyad par bya rgyu las// 'dod log rgya mtsho ma ngoms te// tha tshig drag po yal 'gyur nas// pho brang pad+ma'i ling+ga'i dkyil// pad+mo 'bar ba'i dbus gnas par// oM gyi rang bzhin 'od gsal 'bar// gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na// phaT kyis drag tu brdabs pa las// 'od 'dril pad+ma'o mtshon cha las// 'dod chags rgya mtsho bskams gyur nas// pad+ma chos kyi ye shes 'bar// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na// rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// e ma'i pad+mo'i tha tshig las// pad+ma'i ye shes 'od 'bar bas// don du mi gtong gzhi bskyed de// gsung mchog gdung chen rgyud mnyam nas// ji ltar pad stong tsher ma ltar// rgyu las gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis// pad+mo'i ye shes nub ma khad// 'du shes phung po'i zhing khams su// rtogs pa'i chos nyid 'od 'phros pas// gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen las// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam

bskang// gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// gsung mchog bskal pa'i thugs dam rnams// skongs gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyang// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang// lce yi brda yi tshul phyag sbyar// phrag dog rig kyi dam tshig las// rtogs nas spyad par bya rgyu las// phrag dog log bzung dbang gis na// tha tshig drag po yal 'gyur ba// pho brang gsang ba'i ling+ga'i dkyil// rdo rje ral gri dbus gnas par/ ha yi rang bzhin 'od gsal 'bar// gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na/ phaT kyis drag tu brdabs pa las// 'od 'dril rdo rje'i ral gri yis// phrag dog mtshon chags gsibs gyur nas/ rdo rje ral gri ye shes 'bar// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na// rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// e ma'o phrin las tha tshig las// rdo rje ral gri 'od 'bar bas// don du mi gtong gzhi bskyed de// phrin las gdung chen rgyud mnyam las// ji ltar nyi gsal sprin bsgribs ltar// rgyu las gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rdo rje 'od chen nub ma khad// 'du bye phung po'i zhing khams su// ye shes mtshon cha'i 'od 'phros pas// gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen las// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// phrin las bskal pa'i thugs dam rnams// skong gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyang// oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang// lus kyi brda yi tshul phyag sbyar// des kyang skong pa'i las chen 'grub// man ngag thabs kyi don mchog ni// rtsa ba yan lag de rnams las// gang dag nyams par gyur pa la// man ngag thabs mchog lnga yis bskang// nyams pa chen por ltung 'gyur na// bla mar gyur pa'i skyes bu dag/ rgyal po dgu yi spyan lam du// sgrub pa chen po dgu brtsam zhing// mchog chen dgu yi brtul zhugs spyad// rang gi gzungs ma gang yin pa// bla ma dgu la gzungs mar dbul// de bzhin rtsa ba yan lag dang// zla dang zhar las nyams pa la// sgrub pa don gyi khyad par rnams// bdun nam lnga'am gsum mam gcig/ rim pa bzhin du sbyar byas na// des ni skongs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// bskang ba'i yul yang rnam lnga ste// bder gshegs rgyal ba mtha' dag kyang// mdo ru bsdu na rnam lnga ste// gti mug zhes sdang nga rgyal dang// 'dod chags phrag dog 'di lnga dag/ rtsa bar gyur pa'i don gyis na// gzhi yang thams cad 'dis bsgyur bas// nyams dang ma nyams tha tshig dang/ longs spyod spong len thams cad rnams// 'di rgyu yin par rig bya ste// rgyu nyid rgyur btags dbang gis ni// bsgyur bas dug 'gyur sman chen ltar// de nyid tha tshig btsan por bsgyur// 'dul ba'i dbang [(]26[)]

gi khyad par gyis// de bzhin rdo rje rin chen dang// pad+mo las lnga'i rigs su 'dus// de dag thugs dam mchog nyid kyang// rnam lngar 'dus par bstan pa la// rtogs nas bsrung bsgrub dam bcas pa/ so so 'gal zhing chag nyams na// so so nyid du bsab par bya// sku yi chags nyams gnas su gzhug/ gsung gi 'gal 'khrul so ru bsab// thugs kyi 'gal 'khrul gsor med de// rdo rje snying po'i tha tshig la// bskangs pas skongs par gyur pa yi// rtags chen dag kyang 'di lta ste// rgyal ba sangs rgyas rig 'dzin gyi// gdung chen dag las byung ba yi// sha ri ram zhes bya ba de// thams cad ltas su ston par byed// shel gyi za ma tog nang du// dag par bcug ste btsas pa las// nyams pa'i chad pa 'byung ba'i tshe// kha dog gnag cing 'bros par 'gyur// nyams pa skongs sam sor chud cing// gal te dam tshig ma nyams na/ kha dog dkar zhing 'tsher bar 'gyur// legs pa'i yon tan 'byung ba'i tshe// grangs mang rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur// gal te gnag gam mi gsal na// smyur te bsgrims nas bskor bzlog bya/ 'on tang nyams pa mi phog cing// de dag so ru gso ba na// rtags chen 'di ni bsten bya ste// 'di dag shin tu brtags nas ni// dkar la 'tsher bar gyur pa na// rtsa ba yan lag nyams pa rnams// skongs te sor chud rtags yin no// des na rnam 'byor las kyi gtsor// sbyong dang skong ba'i las rnams bya// bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs pa dang/ 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i bdud kyi sde pa las lha'i rigs su gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi 'khor 'phags pa'i rigs 'dzin pa nyon mongs pa'i lnga'i bdag po lha chen po lnga la sogs pa bka'i snod du rung bar byin gyis brlabs te 'khod pa las/ 'dod chags thams cad kyi gtso bo rdo rje bram ze thod pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' ltar ma bgyis na ma dad ma mgus 'gal 'khrul du gyur pa'i chad pa'i skyes gnas dang rnam par smin pa ji ltar 'gyur/ bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa las/ bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags kyi bdag po la sogs pa rnams dam tshig nyams pa'i chad pa'i skye gnas 'dri ba legs kyis yid tshim par byed pa bshad kyis nyon cigartsa ba yan lag 'di dag las// gal te zhig gam nyams gyur na// rnal 'byor las kyi dang po las// lung gi gsang sgor zhugs pa'i tshe// don dang ldan pa'i bla ma yis// rdo rje tha tshig byin brlabs nas// lce la dam tshig chu bzhag pa// dmyal ba rdo rjer dmod btsugs nas// yi ge hU~M du byas pa de// snying gi dkyil

du thim nas kyang// lcags kyi sdig pa mgo dgu pa'i// khro bo rak+Sha zhes bya ba'i// khrag 'thung chen por gyur nas ni// snying khrag bzhibs te 'thungs nas ni// sdug bsngal chen por bsad nas kyang// dmyar ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur// gal te tha tshig ma nyams la// lce la bzhag pa ar+g+ha ste// snying gi dkyil du thim nas kyang// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang bar// gyur te sgrib pa kun sbyangs nas// sangs rgyas sras su skyed par byed// 'dod chags dam tshig nyams gyur na// mngal gyi grong khyer chen por 'gro// zhes sdang dam tshig nyams gyur na// rak+Sha srin po'i rigs su 'gro// gti mug dam tshig nyams gyur na// mi gtsang zas su za ba yi// rmongs pa'i phag chen lus su ltung// nga rgyal dam tshig nyams gyur na// rus sbas nag po'i lus su ltung// phrag dog dam tshig nyams gyur na// chu srin mgo dgu'i lus su ltung// dam tshig chen po kun nyams na// ru dra nag po'i lus su ltung// las kyi rkyen dang ma phrad na// thar pa'i skabs ni mi srid do// sems dpa'i rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// nyon mongs pa lnga'i bdag po rig 'dzin rnams kyis shin tu cho nge chen po 'byin cing dus der e ma'o bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar na bdag la ltung rgyu mchis te/ dang po bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la btags pa'i tshe/ bka' la ma dad ma gus pas bka' la skur cing spyas long btags pa dang/ ston pa dang grogs la smad cing spyas long btags pa la sogs pa ltung ba'i rgyu mang po bgyis pas// da ni bdag kyang chad pa'i skye gnas su mchi bar nges na// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje chen pos bzung ste bka'i 'khor du bkod pas nga ni thar pa thob lags grang// lon kyang 'gyod pa drag po'i dbang gis yid kyi sgrib pa ni byang chub sems kyis bshags// ngag gi sgrib pa ni tshig tu 'don cing smres te bshags/ lus kyi sgrib pa ni lus gdan khri la phul te bshags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rjes bzung 'tshal na gnyen po ni gang lags/ thabs ni ji ltar bshags/ yul ni gang la bshags/ rgyu ni gang mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa thugs rjes bskyab tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rig 'dzin chen po mi thod can rnams nyon cig/ ltung bar gyur pa'i gnas rnam la 'gyod par gyur nas zhus pa legs so// ltung ba'i gnyen po ni gang zhe na/ nyes byas rnams bshags par 'dod na gang 'gyod pa drag po skyes nas ba spu ni gzings mchis ma 'byin pa yin no// thabs ni rnam pa bzhi yod de/ gang zhe na/ shes rab chen po'i rgyud kyi bag chags thams cad rang bzhin med par shes pa

dang/ ting nge 'dzin chen po'i mes bag chags thams cad bsregs te med par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis bag chags kyi mun nag thams cad bsal te de dag dag par bya ba dang/ spyod pa rlabs po che'i chus bkru ba'o// de la bshags par bya ba'i yul ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang/ rig 'dzin dang/ lha dang/ bla ma dang/ glegs bam dang/ grogs po dang/ rten du gyur pa rnams so// bshags par bya ba'i rgyu ni 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa che chung bshags pa'o// nyon mongs pa rags pa mngon du gyur ba bshags pa dang/ bag la nyan dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bshags pa'o// de'i phyir ltung bar gyur pa'i las rnams 'gyod pa drag pos bsten la thabs la mkhas pas dpyad de// sgrib pa che chung cha shas kyis phye la gus par bshags pa gyis shigade skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ rig 'dzin chen po mi'i thod pa can rnams mgu zhing rangs te rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i phyag byas nas/ 'gyod cing gdug ba'i glu 'di blangs so/ oM ye shes sku mchog rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni// zla rgyas bzhin du spros pa mi mnga' yang// thugs rje nyi gsal 'od bzhin snyoms mdzad lha// bder gshegs gzhugs shing bdag la dgongs su gsol// brjod med shes rab mi g.yo chos mchog dbyings// bde chen longs spyod rdzogs sku rigs lnga'i gtso// thugs rje thabs mkhas rgya chen ro pa yi// cho 'phrul sprul pa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul pa yi// kun tu bzang po bla med mchod sprin gyis// mkha' dbyings rnam dag rgya chen yongs bkang nas// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rgya cher mchod// kun du bzang mo yum gyi b+ha ga la// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang du ro gcig pa'i// gnyis med byang chub sems kyis mnyes gyur cig/ sems kyi rang bzhin chos dbyings nam mkha' che// chos nyid rnam dag rgya che 'od gsal bas// rnal 'byor nyid dbyings smra bsam las 'das pas// mnyam nyid byang chub sems la rtag tu 'dud// kun bzang rdzogs chen ye nas bdal ba la// phyi nang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa ni// snang srid rnam dag kun bzang yum gyi dbyings// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur yab yum lhun rdzogs rnams// gsang chen rab rdzogs gzungs chen bdag nyid ma// gnyis med thig le chen por 'od gsal ba// cir yang snang bas bde chen g.yung drung lha/ 'du 'bral med pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// bdag nyid chen po bcom ldan yab yum dang// byang chub lcam dral khro bo khro mo'i tshogs// rdo rje lha mo tshogs rje tshogs kyi bdag/ ma ltar byams shing sring ltar gdung la sogs// nyes legs ltar 'dzin dam tshig rjes gcod ma// dbang gyur

rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol// thugs rjes gdung 'tshob rdo rje thod pa can// bdag cag dregs pa'i bdag po 'dir tshogs kun// 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub sems bskyed de// bla med go 'phang 'thob par bya ba'i phyir// bstan pa rgya mtsho so so'i 'dul khrims dang// sku gsung thugs dang mnyam sbyor sdom pa'i mchog/ 'da' dka' rdo rje dam tshig gtan gyi gnyer// spyi dang lhag pa'i khyad par dam tshig rnams// snga phyi mnos shing gnyer du rma'o 'tshal// don las gol zhing ldog sems ma mchis kyang// gdod bya long yod snyam pa'i le lo dang// klong du gyur pa'i rtsal shug chung ba yis// shes bzhin ma ldan dam tshig 'gal 'gyur te// dang po'i tha tshig bka' la btags pa'i tshe// bka' la ma gus gal bgyis dpyas long btogs// bar du bslab pa'i gnyer chen phog pa'i tshe// bslab la mi brtson don la g.yel ba dang// tha ma 'di tshe 'bras bu sgrub pa na// bka' dang gzhung bzhin ma lcogs don las 'gal// tshor dang ma tshor sgrib pa che chung rnams// shin tu mi shes ma rig dbang gis na// ston pa'i bka' dang dam las 'gal bgyis pa// dpa' bo thugs rjes bdag la bzod par gsol// 'khor ba thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas// las kyi dbang gis bdag cag ring du 'khyams// nyon mongs log par lta ba'i dug 'thungs te// sdug bsngal nad kyis shin tu gdungs pa la// bde gshegs thugs rjes sman pa'i rgyal po yis// dam tshig bdud rtsi thar ba'i sman stsal bas// nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i nad rnams zhi mdzad cing// bla med byang chub snying por 'tsho mdzad pa// byams mgon thugs rje'i bdag la skyabs su mchi// zhes ngus nas/ a la la ho zhes brjod de gnyen po drag por bsten nas lus gdan khri phul te/ byang chub sems kyis rnam par 'dud pa'i don la rnam par sbyangs pas lus gcer bu zang mar phyung/ gnod pa drag po'i 'gyod pa byas pas bde bar gshegs pa rnams mnyes par gyur to// des sbrib pa byang zhing bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs pa'i rtags lus gos dang phral nas ldan pa'i thod pa yang zla ba tshes brgyad par gyur to// sa thob pa'i rtags su de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs rten du gnas par gyur to// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje de dgyes te bka' stsal pa/ mi'i thod pa can rnams 'gyod pa'i las kyis bshags pa legs te/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur to// da ni shes bya'i sgrib pa dag cing ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir nyan pa'i dbang pos sangs rgyas kyis gsung la gsang sngags kyi sgra rnams nyon cig/ des ni sa nas sar 'phar zhing 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsungs pas

'khor bsam pa rangs par gyur to// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las skong ba las bsgrub lugs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog nyid ting nge 'dzin rgyas shing rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po yang ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyang sna tshogs 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad ci yang med par mthong ngo// chos thams cad ci yang med par gsal bar gyur pa dang/ chos nyid stong pa'i nam mkha' las brag ca'i tshul du sgra 'di byung ngo// mi gnas mi rtog bsam dang bral// ma chags chags bral yul las 'das// ci yang mi 'byung cir ma yin// rang byung rang zhi brjod dang bral// zhes sgra byung bas ston pa ni don gyi che ba phyung// 'khor rnams ni rtsal sbyangs/ thams cad don la ngam zhing chos nyid kyi nam mkha' mthong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po nyid snying rje rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas chos nyid kyi nam mkha' la snying rje byang chub sems kyi gzugs brnyan nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhig shar bar gyur to// de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams yang dag par rtog pa 'di ltar skyes te// e ma chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'di ltar yin pa las 'di ltar ma shes pa'i 'gro ba rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba 'di yang snying rje zhes snying rje byang chub kyi sems skyes par gyur to// de nas nyi ma'i snying po'i 'od zer las cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ngo// yongs la khyab pa'i nyi ma'i 'od// snying rje byang chub sems yin te// rnam rtog mun pa sel bar snang// yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'o// zhes sgra byung ba las chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer du gsal bar gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i mchog gi bdag po de nyid cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams kyis nyi ma'i snying po las chos thams cad kyi rgyu yi ge a dkar po shar bar mthong ngo// de nas a las cho 'phrul sgra byung ngo// a ni chags med yi ge'i mdzod// cho 'phrul rtog pa kun gyi rgyu// nyon mongs skyon bral zla ba'i mdog/ cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu// zhes sgra byung bas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis chos thams cad cho 'phrul gyi rang bzhin du gnas par mthong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de ci yang mi mdzad pa cho

'phrul sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin du snang bar gyur to// de nas yum chen mo nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba de chos thams cad nam mkha'i b+ha gar byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs par gyur pa dang 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad nam mkha' khyab pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ngo// de nas yum gyi b+ha ga'i snying po las 'od zer mthing ga 'phros nas nyi ma'i snying po'i a la bskul bas yi ge e mthing ga 'phros te lding zhing gnas pa las cho 'phrul gyi rang sgra 'di byung ngo// a ni e yi rang bzhin te// a las e byung mkha' khyab bdal// mi 'gyur thogs med bsam las 'das// mtha' dang dbus med kun du bdal// zhes sgra byung bas// thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du phyam chad par gyur to// de nas yang yum chen mo las kyi dbyings phyug mas yang zhing g.yo ba rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// des 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad rlung gi rang bzhin du gnas par mthong ngo// de nas rlung de las cho 'phrul kyi sgra byung ngo// a yi byin brlabs ye shes las// rlung gi cho 'phrul ya~M du shar// thams cad 'debs pa'i stobs ldan zhing// rang bzhin g.yo zhing thogs med 'phyo// zhes sgra byung bas rlung gi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil par gyur to// de nas yum chos kyi dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba des 'bar 'phro me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad me'i rang bzhin du gnas par mthong ngo// de nas mi'i 'od zer la cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ba// a yi byin brlabs ye shes las// cho 'phrul me yi nying por shar// 'bar bas gsal byed ye zhes 'phro// dngos po kun zad med klong 'tshub// ces sgra byung bas me'i bskal pa 'byam klas so// de nas yang yum rin chen dbyings phyug ma zhes bya bde sdud pa rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// des 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyi chos thams cad chu'i rang bzhin du gnas par mthong ngo// de nas rlabs kyi 'od zer las cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di byung ngo// rgyu yi yi ge 'od zer las// chu yi snying po'i cho 'phrul shar// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'o// klung mtsho thams cad rgyas par gyur// zhes sgra byung bas thams cad yum rin chen dbyings phyug ma'i rang bzhin gyis khyab par gnas so// de nas yum chen mo rdo rje dbyings phyug ma zhes bya bas zhing khams thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad sa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ngo// de nas sa rdo rje 'bar ba

zhes bya ba las cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ba// mi dmigs pa las sna tshogs par// snang ba'i cho 'phrul 'di byung ba// rnal 'byor sa bcu rdzogs pa'i don// lhun gyis grub pas bde ba che// zhes sgra byung bas sa dgu 'dul ba'i bye brag tu thugs su chud par gyur to// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de ri bo brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// des 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad rdo rje 'bar ba'i ri bor mthong ngo// de nas de'i 'od las cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di byung ngo// rnam dag shes rab mkha' klong nas// rdo rja 'bar ba'i ri bo shar// rgya che gting zab nam 'phang gcod// rtog pa'i ri bo 'joms par byed// ces sgra byung bas rdo rje 'bar ba'i ri bos nyon mongs pa'i ri bo thams cad zil gyis mnan to// de nas dbyings phyug ma chen mo lnga/ shes rab zab mo'i gzhal yas yum gyi mkha' klong rnam dag ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// b+ha ga'i snying po las cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di byung ngo// b+ha ga gsang ba'i 'od zer las// bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gzhal yas khang// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dpag tu med// dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings// zhes sgra byung ngo// byung bas nam mkha' thams cad pho brang gi gzhal yas 'byams klas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog de nyid chos thams cad sku la yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nam phyag rgya thams cad rnam par spyod zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams kyis 'khor ba dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos thams cad bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po'i zhabs kyi gdan khri yan chad nas dbu'i gtsug ter man chad du rdzogs par mthong ngo// de nas yang 'khor ba 'dod pa khams ni chags pa khrag gi rgya mtshor rdzogs/ 'khor ba gzugs kyi khams ni zhing chen gyi sa gzhi bdal ba la rdzogs par mthong ngo// keng rus la gzugs med pa'i khams rdzogs par mthong ngo/ ri rab kyi kha mu tig gi gcal dang/ a sma gar ba'i 'bar ba'i 'od 'khrigs pa'i nor bu rin po che 'bar ba'i brag gtams pa la// nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rdzogs par mthong ngo// nor bu rin po che'i steng na rdo rje rtse gsum dang rtse lnga'i brag gtams pa la kri yang dang u pa ya dang yo ga rnams rdzogs par mthong ngo// rdo rje brag chen gyi steng na pad+ma dkar po'i man+Dal la bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor pa thams cad rdzogs par mthong ngo// pad+ma'i steng na nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang/ zla ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi kha sbyor du bkod pa la dbang phyug pho nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang/ mo nyi

shu rtsa bzhi rdzogs par mthong ngo// dbang phyug pho mo'i steng byol song gi gtso bo brgyad ni rig 'dzin chen po'i rnal 'byor nyon mongs pa sbyangs nas shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyangs pa'i phyir dpag brtul stag dang/ 'jigs byed seng ge dang/ gdug pa'i gzigs dang/ gtum pa'i dom dang/ stobs kyi glang po dang/ brjid pa'i ma he dang/ 'dzin pa'i chu srin dang/ zhe sdang gi sbrul rnams la rig 'dzin thams cad la yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo// gzhal yas chen po 'bar ba la yul kun tu bzang mo rdzos par mthong ngo// me dpung chen po dgu la ye shes kyi sgo dgu brtsegs su yongs su 'bar bar rdzogs par mthong ngo// zhabs brgyad la gsar ba'i yum bzhi dang/ sgo ma bzhi rdzogs par mthong ngo// dur khrod kyi rgyan chen po bco brgyad ni ma mo chen mo bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par gsal lo// phyag mtshan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni phra men ma bcu dbyug pa 'phyar ba'i lag na khyung bcu 'bar ba'i mtshon cha sna tshogs 'phro ba/ mkha' 'gro brgyad dbyug par 'phyag ba'i nag na seng ge kha glal ba brgyad kyi kha nas ral gri 'bar ba brgyad 'phro ba/ shugs 'gro brgyad dbyugs par 'phyar ba'i lag na stag mche ba gcig pa brgyad kyi kha nas rdo rje sna tshogs 'phro ba/ ma mo brgyad dbyug par 'phyar ba'i lag na mi mgo brgyad rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis btags nas klad la bskor ba/ 'bar ma brgyad dbyug par 'phyar ba'i lag na me dpung 'bar ba brgyad las thu lum 'phro ba ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su gsal lo// phyag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni khrag 'thung 'bar ba bzhi/ ging pho dgu mo dgu/ za byed pha bcu gsod byed ma bcu ste bcu bzhi rtsa gnyis su gsal lo// zhal nyi shu rtsa gcig ni srid pa za byed gsang ba'i dur khrod nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gsal lo// spyan 'bar ba drug cu rtsa bzhi ni he ru ka yab yum drug bcu rtsa bzhir gsal lo// dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gsal lo// g.yas kyi dbu bdun gyi spyi gtsug nas sangs rgyas kyi sku re re byung ba'i dbu la 'khor lo 'od zer dang bcas pa re re 'bar ba/ dbus kyi dbu bdun las dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyi dbu re re byung ba'i sku la rin po che'i mchod rten 'bar ba bdun du gsal ba/ g.yon gyi dbu bdun las dbu rkyen sangs rgyas kyi sku re re byung ba'i dbu+u la nor bu rin po che bdun du gsal ba/ 'khor lo dang mchod rten dang/ rin po che de dag gi lte ba dang/ bum pa dang/ rtse mo las rgyal mtshan chen po bcu 'bar ba ni rgya bye'u lcags kyi rgyal mtshan dang/ gdul bya sha ba'i rgyal mtshan dang// gcan gzan gzig gi rgyal mtshan dang// sprul pa rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang/ rin chen sbrul nag gi rgyal mtshan

dang// dpa' bo stag gi rgyal mtshan dang// gzi mdangs mi'i rgyal mtshan dang// dmar gsal khrag gi rgyal mtshan dang// rtsal chen seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang// gtum chen dom gyi rgyal mtshan dang// rgyal mtshan de rnams kyi rtse mo gcig tu 'dus te/ gser gyi gtsug tor tog stong 'bar ba'o// de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis zhabs kyi gdan khri yan chad nas dbu'i gtsug tor man chad du yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo// dbu las byung ba'i sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa gcig dang/ rgyal mtshan chen po bcu la rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo// dbu'i gtsug tor rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la gser gyi tog stong ni rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor nyid du gsal bar mthong ngo// de ltar mthong zhing gsal bar gyur pa dang/ chos thams cad sku la yongs su rdzogs pa'i don la 'khor thams cad dam zhing ngo mtshar skyes par gyur tau// rnal 'byor chen po rnams kyis sku la yongs su bstod pa/ e ma'i chos kun sku la yongs su rdzogs pas chos kyi sku// rdo rje che mchog phyag 'tshal he ru ka/ chos nyid mkha' la skar tshogs rgyas pa'i sku// dbyar gyi char sprin gtibs pa lta bu'i gzugs// chu rlabs lta bur brjod pa'i zhal gdangs shing// nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer bdal ba bzhin// theg chen dgu dang 'khor ba'i chos rnams kun// phyag rgya gcig tu bkod nas rdzogs pa'i sku// sku gsum lhun grub chos sku tog stong 'bar// dbu skra kham nag ral pa'i cod pan can// klu rgyal 'bum gyis bklubs shing mchod kun 'bul// rdo rje gsung gis ljags sgra brdabs bas kyang// hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra skad 'jigs par sgrogs// theg chen don dam gsang sngags sgrogs pa'i tshig/ 'bar ba'i smin ma mun rum glog ltar 'gyu// spyan dmar bzlog pa'i sdang mig nyi ltar 'bar// 'bar ba'i shangs nas bskal pa'i tshul nag 'khyil// rdo rje thog dang gnam lcags ser chen 'bebs// rno dbal mche ba zang yag gtsigs pa yis// nyon mongs log lta'i tshogs la ngam zhing 'khrug/ thos rus sha khrag rkang rus 'bu dang rnag/ za byed rngam pa'i zhal du chem chem gsol// sbrul gdug ko rlon la sogs 'jigs pa'i rgyan// rngam pa'i sku la shin tu brjid par brgyan// za byed rngam dang 'jigs byed mang po'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i phyag 'tshan sprul pa'i pho nya mdzad// 'khor ba kun dang thar pa'i chos rnams kun// dpa' bo chen po'i gdan du brjid cing rol// 'gran gyi zla med che btsan gcig pu nyid// gsang mchog 'bar ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// de skad ces bstod pas chos thams cad sku la yongs su rdzogs shing sangs ma rgyas pa med par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba

mchog gi bdag po de nyid phyag rgya thams cad phyag rgya bkod pa'i pho brang du gyur to// spro ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po chos nyid rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// nam mkha' don gyi glegs bam la// skar tshogs rig pa'i yig bris te// 'byung chen bzhi yi sgra sgrags pas// gsang sngags chos kyi rgyun mi 'chad// chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba yongs su rdzogs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des bdud rtsi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// stong gsum b+han d+ha'i bzang khong du// srid gsum sems can dug chen las// dus gsum sangs rgyas rtsi sbyar bas// bdud rtsi dkyil 'khor lhun gyis rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de mchod pa rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'khor ba rgya mtsho'i yo byad rnams// mchod pa rgya mtsho'i rgya?n yin te// srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun// kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de bzlas brjod rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'khor ba chos kyi dbyings nyid la// sems can sangs rgyas nying por shar// sgra skad bsam gyis mi khyab pa// thams cad bzlas brjod sngags kyi tshig/ ces gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de sbyor ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'khor ba shes rab yum nyid la// snying rje thabs kyi rgyal po yis// 'du 'bral med par sbyar bas ni// thams cad rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed// ces gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de sgrol ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'khor ba bsgral ba'i zhing 'di dag/ ye shes 'bar ba'i mtshon chen gyis// rang bzhin med par bsgral nas ni// mnyam nyid chos sku chen por bton// zhes gsungs so// de nas yangs sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de sku gdung rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dod khams rmang gi ri rab la// gzugs khams bang rim khri 'phang brtan// gzugs med bum rten bum par bcas// gdung chen chos skur rgyun du gnas// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// nam mkha' med chu sa rlung

rnams// rmang gzhi ri rab rten du snang// bang rim ri bdun bcas pa rnams// de nyid bang rim khri 'phang brtan// ro bo bum rten bum par bcas// 'di yang chos sku rgyun mi chad// sems dpa' rdo rje des yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dzugs pa'i yan lag bzhi rmang rtan// 'khor lo tshogs chen khri 'phang brtan// yan lag dang po bum rten bcas// lcang lo cod pan phreng bas bklubs// zhes gsungs so// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des zhi ba yongs su slong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ro yi sgrub lugs chen po ni// dur khrod chen po'i gnas rnams su// ro yi rdzas rnams btsan nas kyang// 'dod pa bsgyur ba'i sngags kyis gdab// ro yi steng du gnas nas ni// ro yi gnyen por bdag bsams nas// ro sngags rgyun mi chad par bzlas// ro yi bkrag dang mdangs byung na// grub par 'gyur ba'i rtags yin te// rgyun mi 'chad par ting 'dzin bya// ro ni 'gul bar gyur pa dang// gser 'gyur rtsis ni byug par bya// ro yi yan lag kun bcings nas// sngags ni dag par bzlas par bya// ro nyid langs par gyur pa dang/ ro yi cho 'phrul ston par byed// brtul zhugs ldan pa'i skye bu yis// de tshe ro yi lce bcad nas// ro la brngabs nas gser du 'gyur// de bzhin ji ltar 'dod pa yis// rkyen gyis
